title: Cook

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose someone to cook for. They will be cured of negative status effects (poison, frame, blackmail, etc) and astrally visit their target, but they and all their visitors are covered in cooking oil.
- At night, instead you may choose to Clean a target or Ignite.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Igniting deals a basic attack to all players covered in cooking oil. *You do not ignite yourself.*
- Cleaning removes oil from a target
- Killing a town member causes you to lose the ability to ignite
